title: Live&Witching
description: As if one life wasn't enough! Aurelia Gale is a typical High School Junior. She wants to have good grades, spend time with friends and maybe just maybe get her crush to notice her. Sadly, there is more to her than meets the eye. After being ambushed by a lunatic one night she finds herself balancing her daily life with magic lessons. But that’s not all. The local witches are hiding something from her and she wants to know what. Soon Aurelia finds herself caught in the middle of lies, deceit and a ‘centuries old’ war; and discovers a secret that will make her question everything she has ever believed herself to be.
author: Delia Winters
